column8: On the shoulders with legs over the head.
Like shoulder stand but arms point upwards

English: Inverted practice, Legs up the wall

column8: Reclining on the side, lifting leg with peace fingers.

Variation: Butterfly legs, buttterfly legs and arms, reverse corpse (lying on the front)

column8: Lying on back, pull one knee to chest.

English: Shooting bow, Archer, Bow and arrow
Lord of the Fishes, Matsyendra's pose
Lord of the Dance, Nataraja's Pose

Variation: Prayer hands, revolving, hands clasped behind back, holding opposite elbows
leg to the side, leg to the front
